lines.text: The thing is, the grim lord Electrotron, Final Overseer of the Metal Hell...
When you surround a loop of wire in flame, he's summoned into this world! And by his power, no one is allowed to die!
They must power his engines forever, the agony of their eternal death throes feeding his dark reverie!
If this ash pile were really a roaring flame, we wouldn't be surrounded by dead bodies...
The hellish automatons of the forsaken deeps would be pouring forth! None would be safe!
That's- wait, no, it definitely- there was definitely a-
Whydah, %THEYRE% just yankin' your chain. There's no such thing.
